Articles.Content:
Hey there,

yay .. 1.0 is out, but meh .. career mode isnt working. It looks very similar to the career mode bug we had in the 64bit build of 0.90 (if i remember that correctly). All buildings start out fully upgraded. Left-clicking on Mission Control, R&D or the Admin Building ends up in a "This facility is closed"-popup. SH & VAB do not offer any parts (pods, fuel tanks and the like). ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

ok, i already solved that problem by myself .. yay!

Seems that some files of the update (steam version) contained some errors (maybe due to bad connection .. but then again there are checksums .. well, idk ..).

After checking the files via steam it downloaded 400andsomething files again (~10mb) and voila ... it works ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Edit: I should note, that i manually removed the whole ksp folder from the steamapps folder before i actually started steam to get ksp 1.0 - not sure if that confused steam a bit ...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T19:27:50Z" title="04/27/2015 07:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by assc**
good job assc, Steam always seems to mess that up ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
